p: Dose–response modelling and graphs were prepared using R Studio program, Drc package [ 27]. The LC 50 value indicates the concentration of toxins that kill 50% of individuals in the sample. Dose–response data were described using a log-logistic model according to the Formula (1): Y = d/(1 + exp^(b(log(x) − log(e)))) (1) where d refers to the upper and the lower horizontal asymptotes, e is the inflexion point corresponding to the LC50 value and b is the slope around e [ 27].
